note.p: Labourer. Resided in Cudham, Kent, a neighbouring village to Down. Secretary of the Down Friendly Society. Licensee of the Old Jail inn, Cudham, 1881. Grocer in Down, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/855/79/24), 1891 (RG12/631/39/19)
Correspondence vol. 24, letter to J. M. F. Ludlow, 11 February 1876
